caption:
In 2021, while voting for myself for the Mayor of New York City, I was denied entry to the poll site with Gizmo, my & Nancy's rescue cat 🐈  One of my Mayoral platforms was "No-Kill" #NYC animal shelters.  Today, we are still far from that goal, but the fight continues. 💪 

And don't forget, TODAY is the day, folks! Election Day... Make sure you get out & vote! 

#vote #electionday #CurtisSliwa #Gizmo #cats #adoptdontshop❤️ #nancysliwa
